channel.title: My SQl issue
channel.description:
How Do i stop this being spammed on the run.bat it usually also displays access denied for user / my hostname.
[CODE][27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.j ava:1055) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.j ava:956) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java: 3536) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java: 3468) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java: 917) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.secureAuth411(MysqlIO.java:397 4) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1282)
[27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.createNewIO(ConnectionI mpl.java:2142) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.<init>(ConnectionImpl.j ava:773) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.JDBC4Connection.<init>(JDBC4Connection .java:46) [27/03/11 17:54]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance 0(Native Method) [27/03/11 17:54]: at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance (NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.java:39) [27/03/11 17:54]: at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInst ance(DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.java:27) [27/03/11 17:54]: at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Constructor .java:513) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Util.handleNewInstance(Util.java:406) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.ConnectionImpl.getInstance(ConnectionI mpl.java:352) [27/03/11 17:54]: at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegist eringDriver.java:282) [27/03/11 17:54]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.ja va:582) [27/03/11 17:54]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.ja va:185) [27/03/11 17:54]: at server.util.MadTurnipConnection.createConnection(MadT urnipConnection.java:19) [27/03/11 17:54]: at server.util.MadTurnipConnection.run(MadTurnipConnecti on.java:36)[/CODE]
